comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Seth Low (1850-1916), Mayor of New York City, former president of Columbia University: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seth_Low Nicholas Murray Butler (1862-1947), President of Columbia University: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nicholas_Murray_Butler

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: June 3, 1914: Commencement day at Columbia University, New York City.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Seth Low received an honorary BA. See next day's NYT of June 4, 1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=FB0614F63C5E13738...
